      • acceptVote

        public VoteOption acceptVote(java.lang.Long optionId,
                             java.lang.String votedIp,
                             java.lang.String votingKey)
                      throws WrongVotingKeyException
        check vote request IP and voting key to accept vote
        Parameters:
        optionId - - ID of voting option
        votedIp - - IP which vote
        votingKey - - key of voting
        Returns:
        vote option by optionId (with accepted vote or not)
        Throws:
        WrongVotingKeyException - voting key is wrong
        See Also:
        VoteOption
